## Data Generation

#### Maximum Likelihood Solution
$$
\begin{align}
& L(\lambda) = \prod_{i=1}^{n}\frac{(\lambda x_i)^{y_i}}{y_i!} e^{-\lambda}\\
& l(\lambda) = \sum_{i=1}^{n}log(\frac{(\lambda x_i)^{y_i}}{y_i!} e^{-\lambda x_i}) 
= log\lambda\sum_{i=1}^{n}y+\sum_{i=1}^{n}logx_i-\lambda\sum_{i=1}^{n}x_i-\sum_{i=1}^{n}logy_i! \\
& \hat{\lambda}_{MLE} = \\\
\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}X_i\\
\end{align}
$$

```{r}
set.seed(222)
x_sim <- rpois(10, 327)
mean(x_sim)
```
